程序包 org.cloudbus.cloudsim.lists

类 HostList

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.lists.HostList
public class HostList
extends java.lang.Object
HostList is a collection of operations on lists of hosts (PMs).
从以下版本开始:
CloudSim Toolkit 2.0

  • 方法详细资料

    • getById

      public static <T extends Host> T getById​(java.util.List<T> hostList, int id)
      Gets a Host with a given id.
      类型参数:
      T - the generic type
      参数:
      hostList - the list of existing hosts
      id - the host ID
      返回:
      a Host with the given ID or $null if not found

    • getNumberOfPes

      public static <T extends Host> int getNumberOfPes​(java.util.List<T> hostList)
      Gets the total number of PEs for all Hosts.
      类型参数:
      T - the generic type
      参数:
      hostList - the list of existing hosts
      返回:
      total number of PEs for all PMs

    • getNumberOfFreePes

      public static <T extends Host> int getNumberOfFreePes​(java.util.List<T> hostList)
      Gets the total number of FREE (non-busy) PEs for all Hosts.
      类型参数:
      T - the generic type
      参数:
      hostList - the list of existing hosts
      返回:
      total number of free PEs

    • getNumberOfBusyPes

      public static <T extends Host> int getNumberOfBusyPes​(java.util.List<T> hostList)
      Gets the total number of BUSY PEs for all Hosts.
      类型参数:
      T - the generic type
      参数:
      hostList - the list of existing hosts
      返回:
      total number of busy PEs

    • getHostWithFreePe

      public static <T extends Host> T getHostWithFreePe​(java.util.List<T> hostList)
      Gets the first host with free PEs.
      类型参数:
      T - the generic type
      参数:
      hostList - the list of existing hosts
      返回:
      a Host object or null if not found

    • getHostWithFreePe

      public static <T extends Host> T getHostWithFreePe​(java.util.List<T> hostList, int pesNumber)
      Gets the first Host with a specified number of free PEs.
      类型参数:
      T - the generic type
      参数:
      hostList - the list of existing hosts
      pesNumber - the pes number
      返回:
      a Host object or null if not found

    • setPeStatus

      public static <T extends Host> boolean setPeStatus​(java.util.List<T> hostList, int status, int hostId, int peId)
      Sets the status of a particular PE on a given Host.
      类型参数:
      T - the generic type
      参数:
      hostList - the list of existing hosts
      status - the PE status, either Pe.FREE or Pe.BUSY
      hostId - the host id
      peId - the id of the PE to set the status
      返回:
      true if the PE status has changed, false otherwise (host id or PE id might not be exist)
